titles.title: Expressing condolences to and support for the people of Ecuador following the devastating earthquake on April 16, 2016.
Expressing condolences to and support for the people of Ecuador following the devastating earthquake on April 16, 2016.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Western Hemisphere.

committee.subcommittee: Western Hemisphere, Civilian Security and Trade
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

bill.summary:
Expresses condolences on the loss of life following the earthquake in Ecuador on April 16, 2016.
Commends those engaged in the domestic and international response to the earthquake, including international agencies, the U.S. government, and nongovernment organizations.
Supports U.S. efforts to assist the people of Ecuador as they seek to recover from the earthquake.
